description:
wsgi. Loader.__init__  throws AttributeError when path to paste config is invalid.
This should be exception.PasteConfigNotFound
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/stable/diablo/nova/wsgi.py#L367
title: wsgi.__init__ should raise exception.PasteConfigNotFound
